entry.title: Sabine on diagnosing movement via subregular complexity
entry.summary: Hi everyone! This week (March 8) we'll have Sabine visiting from UConn to present on diagnosing movement via subregular complexity. :) Hope to see you there!
entry.content: Hi everyone! This week (March 8) we'll have Sabine visiting from UConn to present on diagnosing movement via subregular complexity. :) Hope to see you there!

entry.title: Alëna presenting OSTIA
entry.summary: Hello all! This Friday (March 1) Alëna will be presenting about her implementation of the OSTIA algorithm. This will be part 1, where she will be presenting an introduction/overview. Part 2 will come after the spring break. Hope to see you there! :)
entry.content: Hello all! This Friday (March 1) Alëna will be presenting about her implementation of the OSTIA algorithm. This will be part 1, where she will be presenting an introduction/overview. Part 2 will come after the spring break. Hope to see you there! :)

entry.title: Nazila on island complexity
entry.summary: Hi all! Apologies for the later than usual announcement. Tomorrow (Feb. 15) Nazila will be presenting about island complexity. Afterwards, we'll be hanging out in the seminar room for an InFormal Friday (IFF) gathering, so come by if you'd like to unwind -- bring snacks/drinks if you like! :) Hope to …
entry.content: Hi all! Apologies for the later than usual announcement. Tomorrow (Feb. 15) Nazila will be presenting about island complexity. Afterwards, we'll be hanging out in the seminar room for an InFormal Friday (IFF) gathering, so come by if you'd like to unwind -- bring snacks/drinks if you like! :) Hope to see you there!

entry.title: No meeting

entry.content:
Hi all! Last week we established our meeting time and rough schedule for this semester. I have created a folder in the shared Google Drive (under 19_Spring) where anyone can drop papers they might want to share with the group. :)

We won't be meeting this week (Feb. 08), so see you next week!
